2:
You people, how long will you turn my honor into shame?
\q How long will you love that which is worthless and seek after lies?
\qs Selah\qs*
\q
3:
But know that Yahweh sets apart the godly for himself.
\q Yahweh will hear when I call to him.
4:
Tremble in fear, but do not sin!
\q Meditate in your heart on your bed and be silent.
\qs Selah\qs*
\q
5:
Offer the sacrifices of righteousness
\q and put your trust in Yahweh.
6:
Many say, "Who will show us anything good?"
\q Yahweh, lift up the light of your face on us.
\q
7:
You have given my heart more gladness
\q than others have when their grain and new wine abound.
\q
8:
It is in peace that I will lie down and sleep,
\q for you alone, Yahweh, make me safe and secure.
